name: Grapeshot Rack
customPrimary: Not affected by missile speed, acceleration, and flight time modifiers.

name: Graviton Lance
customPrimary: Disrupts the target's shields, increasing all shield damage taken by %s for one full-power graviton beam, %s for two, and %s for three or more hitting the shields at the same time.
customAncillary: Gravitic effects slow and push target off-course. The effect is minor and is most noticeable vs fighters and missiles.
